info.instruction: -# Use the buttons below to manage this webhook

invalid_webhook.title: Invalid Webhook
invalid_webhook.description:
Please provide a valid webhook URL or ID/Token.

**Valid formats:**
• `https://discord.com/api/webhooks/ID/TOKEN`
• `ID/TOKEN`

not_found.title: Webhook Not Found
not_found.description: Could not fetch webhook information. The webhook may be invalid or deleted.

errors.author_only: You can't use these buttons, they belong to another user.

success.title: Webhook Deleted
success.description: The webhook **{name}** has been successfully deleted.

failed.title: Deletion Failed
failed.description:
Could not delete the webhook. Status: {status}
```{error}```

success.title: Webhook Updated
success.description: The webhook has been renamed to **{name}**.

failed.title: Update Failed
failed.description:
Could not update the webhook. Status: {status}
```{error}```

success.title: Message Sent
